name: js-player
description: progressive web app to play local media

scripts.build-windows: rmdir /s/q build 2> nul & npm run scss && xcopy /s/e/y src build && xcopy /s/e/y node_modules\font-awesome\fonts build\fonts\ && node node_modules\browserify\bin\cmd -t brfs --debug src\main.js -o build\main.js
scripts.build-windows-src: npm run scss-src && xcopy /s/e/y node_modules\font-awesome\fonts src\fonts\
scripts.watch-windows: nodemon --watch src --watch styleScss -e html,js,scss,css --exec npm run build-windows
scripts.watch-windows-src: nodemon --watch styleScss -e scss,css --exec npm run build-windows-src
